title: Number of M & A transactions in Asia 2015 - 2017 , by country
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of deals on the Y-axis for 9 different Quarters for 4 groups Australia, China/Hong Kong, India, and Japan that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, the Number of deals for India have increased. On the other hand, for China/Hong Kong the Number of deals have lowered.
Out of all 4 groups, China/Hong Kong had the highest Number of deals for Quarter Q4 2016 and India had the lowest Number of deals for Quarter Q3 2017.
Quarter Q1 2016 and Q3 2017 had the biggest gap of 130.0 between the highest and lowest Number of deals found for India.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 9 different Quarters on X-axis for 4 groups Australia, China/Hong Kong, India, and Japan. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of deals.
All through the Quarters, the Number of deals for India have increased. On the other hand, for China/Hong Kong the Number of deals have lowered.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Number of deals on the Y-axis for 9 different Quarters for 4 groups Australia, China/Hong Kong, India, and Japan that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, the Number of deals for India have increased. On the other hand, for China/Hong Kong the Number of deals have lowered.
Out of all 4 groups, China/Hong Kong had the highest Number of deals for Quarter Q4 2016 and India had the lowest Number of deals for Quarter Q3 2017.
Quarter Q1 2016 and Q3 2017 had the biggest gap of 130.0 between the highest and lowest Number of deals found for India.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 9 different Quarters on X-axis for 4 groups Australia, China/Hong Kong, India, and Japan. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Number of deals.
Over the 9 Quarters, the Number of deals for India have been increased whereas lowered for China/Hong Kong.
For Quarter Q4 2016, China/Hong Kong had the highest Number of deals 1059.0 among the 4 groups and in Q3 2017, India had the lowest Number of deals 156.0.
Among all the Quarters, India had the highest Number of deals in Quarter Q1 2016 and lowest Number of deals in Quarter Q3 2017.
The maximum Number of deals for India that was found in Quarter Q1 2016 was 1.83 times larger than the minimum Number of deals observed in Quarter Q3 2017.
Among all 4 groups, China/Hong Kong had the gap of 327.0 between the maximum and minimum Number of deals observed in Quarter Q4 2016 and Q2 2016 respectively.

In case of Quarter Q4 2016, China/Hong Kong had the highest Number of deals 1059.0 among the 4 groups and in Q3 2017, India had the lowest Number of deals 156.0. The second highest Number of deals 404.0 was observed for China/Hong Kong in Quarter Q4 2016.
Averaging all 4 groups Australia, China/Hong Kong, India, and Japan, the Quarter Q4 2016 is the maximum Number of deals and Q2 2016 is the minimum Number of deals.
